code:
%% Sequence Diagram – Issue Document with Automated Backup & Opportunistic Cloud Sync
%% Actors: Secretary (HealthTech_EMR_Sync), System services; aligns to Option B schema

sequenceDiagram
	autonumber
	actor Secretary
	participant UI as User Interface
	participant Auth as AuthService
	participant Iss as IssuanceService
	participant PDF as PdfService
	participant FS as FileSystem
	participant Repo as DB/Repository
	participant Bkp as BackupService
	participant Cloud as CloudSyncService

	Secretary->>UI: Login(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
	UI->>Auth: authenticate(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
	Auth-->>UI: auth result
	UI-->>Secretary: login success

	Note over Secretary,UI: Start issuance
	Secretary->>UI: Enter requester details, type, purpose
	UI->>Iss: createIssuance(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
	Iss->>PDF: generate(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
	PDF-->>Iss: PDF bytes/path
	Iss->>FS: save PDF artifact
	FS-->>Iss: path + fileHash
	Iss->>Repo: save IssuanceRecord + Artifact(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
	Repo-->>Iss: confirm IDs
	Iss-->>UI: issuance created + artifact path
	UI-->>Secretary: show preview/print

	UI->>Bkp: queueLocal(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
	Bkp->>FS: copy to backup location
	FS-->>Bkp: copy OK
	Bkp->>Repo: record BackupLog(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
	Repo-->>Bkp: logged
	Bkp->>Cloud: upload(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)  
	Note over Cloud: If offline, enqueue and retry when online
	Cloud-->>Bkp: result (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
	Bkp->>Repo: update BackupLog + Artifact.syncStatus
	Repo-->>Bkp: updated
	Bkp-->>UI: backup status / alerts
	UI-->>Secretary: notify backup/cloud status

	Note over Secretary,Cloud: End of issuance flow
repo_description: A transaction‑centric records and document issuance system for Barangay Santol (Silang, Cavite), designed for reliability on limited hardware, with automated local backup and opportunistic cloud sync

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 这一块。
不，其实叫 HealthTech_EMR_Sync处理 会更准确一点。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync处理'。
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine'，你看看合适吗？

[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault处理。

可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
